printWidth.description: The line width limitation that markup_fmt should *(but not must)* avoid exceeding. markup_fmt will try its best to keep line width less than this value, but it may exceed for some cases, for example, a very very long single word.

useTabs.description: Specify use space or tab for indentation.

indentWidth.description: Size of indentation. When enabled `useTabs`, this option may be disregarded, since only one tab will be inserted when indented once.

lineBreak.description: Specify whether use `\n` (LF) or `\r\n` (CRLF) for line break.

quotes.description: Control the quotes of attribute value.

oneOf.description: Use double quotes as possible. However if there're double quotes in strings, quotes will be kept as-is.
Use single quotes as possible. However if there're single quotes in strings, quotes will be kept as-is.

formatComments.description: Control whether whitespace should be inserted at the beginning and end of comments and comments should be indented properly or not.

scriptIndent.description: Control whether the code block in the `<script>` tag should be indented or not.

html.scriptIndent.description: Control whether the code block in the `<script>` tag should be indented or not for HTML.

vue.scriptIndent.description: Control whether the code block in the `<script>` tag should be indented or not for Vue.

svelte.scriptIndent.description: Control whether the code block in the `<script>` tag should be indented or not for Svelte.

astro.scriptIndent.description: Control whether the code block in the `<script>` tag should be indented or not for Astro.

styleIndent.description: Control whether the code block in the `<style>` tag should be indented or not.

html.styleIndent.description: Control whether the code block in the `<style>` tag should be indented or not for HTML.

vue.styleIndent.description: Control whether the code block in the `<style>` tag should be indented or not for Vue.

svelte.styleIndent.description: Control whether the code block in the `<style>` tag should be indented or not for Svelte.

astro.styleIndent.description: Control whether the code block in the `<style>` tag should be indented or not for Astro.

closingBracketSameLine.description: Control the closing bracket (`>`) of a multi-line element should come at the end of the last line or on the next line (with a line break).

closingTagLineBreakForEmpty.description: When there're no children in an element, this option controls whether to insert a line break before the closing tag or not.

oneOf.description: Always insert a line break before the closing tag.
Only insert a line break if it doesn't fit the `printWidth` option.
Don't insert a line break.

maxAttrsPerLine.description: Control the maximum number of attributes in one line. If this option is unset, there won't be any limitations. This option conflicts with `preferAttrsSingleLine` option.

preferAttrsSingleLine.description: Control whether attributes should be put on single line when possible. This option conflicts with `maxAttrsPerLine` option.

singleAttrSameLine.description: Control whether single attribute should be put on the same line with tag name.

html.normal.selfClosing.description: Control whether HTML normal element should be self-closed or not if it doesn't have children.

html.void.selfClosing.description: Control whether HTML void element should be self-closed or not if it doesn't have children.

component.selfClosing.description: Control whether Vue/Svelte/Astro/Angular component should be self-closed or not if it doesn't have children.

svg.selfClosing.description: Control whether SVG element should be self-closed or not if it doesn't have children.

mathml.selfClosing.description: Control whether MathML element should be self-closed or not if it doesn't have children.

whitespaceSensitivity.description: Control the whitespace sensitivity before and after the children of an element.

oneOf.description: Respect the default value of CSS `display` property.
Whitespace (or the lack of it) around all tags is considered significant.
Whitespace (or the lack of it) around all tags is considered insignificant.

component.whitespaceSensitivity.description: Control the whitespace sensitivity before and after the children of an element for components.

oneOf.description: Respect the default value of CSS `display` property.
Whitespace (or the lack of it) around all tags is considered significant.
Whitespace (or the lack of it) around all tags is considered insignificant.
Use the value of `whitespaceSensitivity` option.

doctypeKeywordCase.description: Control the case of "doctype" keyword in `<!DOCTYPE>`.

oneOf.description: Keep the case as-is.
Print "DOCTYPE" in upper case.
Print "doctype" in lower case.
Use short-hand form like `:value`.
Use long-hand form like `v-bind:value`.
Style of `v-bind` directive won't be changed.
Use short-hand form like `@click`.
Use long-hand form like `v-on:click`.
Style of `v-on` directive won't be changed.
Use `in` as `v-for` delimiter.
Use `of` as `v-for` delimiter.
Style of `v-for` directive delimiter won't be changed.
Use short-hand form like `#default` or `#named`.
Use long-hand form like `v-slot:default` or `v-slot:named`.
For default slot, use `v-slot` (shorter than `#default`); otherwise, use short-hand form.
Style of `v-slot` directive won't be changed.

component.vSlotStyle.description: Control Vue `v-slot` directive style for Vue components.

default.vSlotStyle.description: Control Vue `v-slot` directive style for default slot.

named.vSlotStyle.description: Control Vue `v-slot` directive style for named slot.

vBindSameNameShortHand.description: Control whether Vue attribute should be written in short-hand form or not if attribute name and value are same.

strictSvelteAttr.description: Control whether Svelte attribute value should be in strict mode or not.

svelteAttrShorthand.description: Control whether Svelte attribute should be written in short-hand form or not when possible.

svelteDirectiveShorthand.description: Control whether Svelte directive should be written in short-hand form or not when possible.

astroAttrShorthand.description: Control whether Astro attribute should be written in short-hand form or not when possible.

scriptFormatter.description: Tell markup_fmt what script formatter you are using.

ignoreCommentDirective.description: Text directive for ignoring formatting specific element or node.

ignoreFileCommentDirective.description: Text directive for ignoring formatting a whole file.
